title: Ratcliffe eyes China in Trump CIA director hearing
shortDescription: Republicans and Democrats praised the former lawmaker and intelligence official, who vowed not to use political loyalty tests at the CIA.

title: Trump's attorney general pick refuses to discuss TikTok ban with senators
shortDescription: Pam Bondi, Trump's choice to become attorney general, refused to talk at her Senate confirmation hearing about enforcing the law that threatens to ban TikTok.

title: Biden greenlights last big batch of student loan relief
shortDescription: On Wednesday, the federal Education Department approved $4.5 billion in student loan forgiveness for 261,000 former Ashford University students.

title: Trump Energy department pick calls for more domestic energy production
shortDescription: Trump Energy nominee Chris Wright's Senate confirmation hearing was briefly stopped by protestors shouting about the LA wildfires and global warming.

title: 'Politics will not play a part': Sparks fly over Trump picks for DOJ lawyers
shortDescription: Trump's pick to have defense lawyers lead the Justice Department sparked some concerns. They will likely to be front and center at today's confirmation hearing.

title: Confirmapalooza: Six Trump picks face Senate hearings
shortDescription: Senators will grill Trump's choices to lead the Justice, State, Transportation and Energy departments,as well as the CIA and the top budget office.

title: How to watch Chris Wright's Senate confirmation hearing, what to know
shortDescription: As the CEO of the Colorado-based Liberty Energy who has said "there is no climate crisis," Wright's nomination comes with controversy.

title: Watch live: President Joe Biden's Oval Office farewell address
shortDescription: On Wednesday night, President Biden will deliver his farewell address as President-elect Donald Trump will return to the White House next week.

title: Independence from Trump? AG pick Pam Bondi faces confirmation hearing
shortDescription: Pam Bondi could be scrutinized at her attorney general confirmation hearing Wednesday over her past lobbying and independence from Donald Trump.

title: Inauguration Day weather forecast: Will it snow on Trump's big day?
shortDescription: Bitter cold – along with a chance of snow – is in the latest forecast for President-elect Donald J. Trump's Inauguration Day.

title: Biden’s age and refusal to pass torch sooner hang over his legacy
shortDescription: President Joe Biden wants his legacy to be defined by his big legislative wins but his initial decision to run for reelection hangs over his exit.

title: Iran says it won't try to assassinate Trump
shortDescription: Iran's leader made the claim less than a week before the president-elect returns to the White House. In his first term, Trump took a tough line on Iran.

title: South Korean authorities arrest impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol
shortDescription: Yoon's declaration of martial law in December stunned South Koreans and plunged one of Asia's most vibrant democracies into political turmoil.

title: Dems support Marco Rubio, Trump's choice for secretary of state
shortDescription: Rubio is seen as a steady foreign policy hand who has the confidence of Trump and Senate colleagues from both parties.

title: President Biden announces new federal monuments
shortDescription: President Joe Biden announced a significant amount of California land as Chuckwalla, Sáttítla National Monuments.
